definition: to return to the right path/to mend one's ways/to reform/Reformed (church etc)
honorific title/form of address reserved for a queen, ancestor, emperor etc
to love the common people as one's own children (praise for a virtuous ruler)
to be in overall charge/to oversee
Zhang Juzheng (1525-1582), Grand Secretary during the Ming dynasty, credited with bringing the dynasty to its apogee
